resources.string: Predicting structure…bear with me, I\'ll get there.
Sorry, I couldn\'t predict your structure - try something a little simpler.
Choose a size and strength for each atom and how many you want on the left. To add more atoms push the plus in the top right. To predict the structure hit \'Predict\'.
